author: jtraglia
content: I'm still not sure if removing them is a good idea. It feels a bit weird to not have the actual commitment saved somewhere that's not temporary. For example, I think it might make it more difficult to prove that some random blob was associated with a particular slot. To prove that the root matches, you'd need a data column sidecar or every other blob from that slot. The sidecars "expire" after the retention period & you might not care to save other people's blobs.
